item.description:
RSVP On Central CT Singles - http://singles.meetup...

Central CT Singles would like to invite you to:

Central CT Singles Billiards and Live Music Party At Ultimate Billiards

Ultimate Billiards is a giant nightclub with Live Music, 20 Pool Tables, Ping Pong, Air Hockey, Darts, and a full bar and menu.

RSVP on: http://singles.meetup...

Join Us For A Fun Night Of Pool and LIVE Music With Central CT Singles At Ultimate Billiards. Meet Local Singles and have FUN! Watch the big game while you party with Central CT Singles.

Don?t play pool? Come on over and listen to the band and keep the guys from getting lonely!

Saturday January 12 at 8pm

Drink Specials for Central CT Singles Group Members

Watch the Big Game on TV

Live Music from Charisma

FREE POOL All Night

FREE Pool Lessons For Beginners

FREE Darts

FREE Air Hockey

FREE Ping Pong

FREE Basketball Games

Have Fun And Meet Local Singles

All age groups are welcome!

Tickets are only $15 online or at the event (Includes $5 Cover Charge, $5 Pool Table Fee, Drink Specials for Central CT Singles Group, and ALL Games)

RSVP Today

Visit http://www.CentralCTS...

Or call Central CT Singles at (860) 236-3343

Tickets are only $15
SPECIAL: Tickets are $12 online Before January 9

More Singles=More Fun!
Bring a friend, and your ticket is half-price ($7.50)
Bring 2 friends, and you get in FREE!

? or buy 2 tickets online for $22.50 or 3 tickets for $30

?just click on (Pay with PayPal) and put 22.50 or 30 in the box:

If your Organizer made it clear that sending a different amount is okay, change this amount:
USD_____


Call us at (860) 236-3343 if you have any questions.

See you at the party!

Jason
Central CT Singles
Membership is FREE, Join The Party And Meet Local Singles!
www.CentralCTSingles.com
(860) 236-3343

Receive our New Events Email - Click Here



UPCOMING EVENTS:
Saturday, January 19 at 8 pm Central CT Singles invites you to the Extreme Neon Bowling Party with Half-Price Bowling! Bowl 2 games for only $9 (including shoes)
Free Billiards and Darts * Prizes * Drink Specials Bowling Ball Prize for the top score! Tickets are only $15

Saturday, February 2 at 7 pm Central CT Singles and CTNites.com invites you to the Theatre Nite at TheaterWorks to see The hilarious and sexy Hollywood play
THE LITTLE DOG LAUGHED To reserve your seat, call (860) 527-7838 and be sure to mention CTNites.com to receive your discount and be seated with our group.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the black "Official CTNite.com VIP Entertainment Clubber" T-Shirts

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends
